column4: Oh.. another question. When I close the lid on my laptop the computer is put to sleep. I changed to power managment settings but I can only set it to blank screen (and some other) but I want it to do nothing because I want to close the lid when I work on another screen at work. How can I get it to do nothing?
blank screen is probably what you're looking for, then
it just turns the light off on the laptop's LCD
No it also got blank on my lcd monitor.
